name: Poruri Sai Rahul
bio: Worked as a Scientific Software Developer for 8 years from India, UK and USA. B.S & M.S in Physics from IIT Madras, Chennai, India

top_projects.name: computational_physics
top_projects.description: methods of computational physics - monte carlo, verlet method for molecular dynamics and the like

top_projects.name: uniLocs
top_projects.description: An interactive map of Universities and Labs worldwide pursuing research in Astronomy & Astrophysics

top_projects.name: astro_data_projects
top_projects.description: astronomical results using publicly available data

top_projects.name: making_a_python_pkg
top_projects.description: Converting a Python script into a maintainable package

top_projects.name: authorAffiliations
top_projects.description: A network showing the affiliations of authors from papers scraped off of arXiv

fossunited/fossunited.summary: Recent activities include the addition of chapter information for external events and the display of instant messaging rooms for FOSS chapters on the page. These updates were made through multiple pull requests and push events, including the addition of Telegram, WhatsApp, and Discord URL fields to the doctype and displaying these fields as part of the social links on the event page.

rahulporuri/fossunited.summary: Recent activities involve feature additions, including adding WhatsApp and Discord as options, and a fix to use event.chapter directly for cases where the chapter is None, preventing crashes and improving overall stability.

profile_summary:
Poruri Sai Rahul is a highly skilled software developer with a strong background in scientific computing, leveraging expertise in programming languages such as C and Python to drive innovation. With a robust professional network of 86 followers and an impressive portfolio of 44 public repositories, Poruri Sai Rahul demonstrates a keen ability to collaborate, share knowledge, and contribute to the development community. As a seasoned Scientific Software Developer with 8 years of experience working in India, the UK, and the USA, Poruri Sai Rahul brings a unique blend of technical expertise and global perspective to the table.

With a solid educational foundation in Physics from the prestigious IIT Madras, Chennai, India, where he earned both his B.S and M.S degrees, Poruri Sai Rahul is well-versed in the application of computational methods to solve complex problems. Proficient in utilizing tools like Jupyter Notebook, he excels in data-driven projects, delivering high-quality solutions that meet the demands of modern scientific research. As a trusted and reliable developer, Poruri Sai Rahul is committed to staying at the forefront of industry trends, continuously enhancing his skills to provide cutting-edge solutions that drive progress and excellence in the field of scientific software development.
